pages.title: Crafting Wallpaper
pages.text: $(br)$(l)Wallpaper$() is a lie...$(br2)Want to give your room a brand new feeling without overhauling the entire house? Why not try some $(#FF9900)wallpaper$()? It instantly refreshes the walls around you, and is easy to change!

pages.title: Blank Wallpaper
pages.text: Before making wallpaper with compicated patterns, the first thing to do is to get a blank one. $(#00EE00)Slime balls$() are needed so that the wallpaper can be pasted onto wall surfaces, tightly.

pages.title: Adding Patterns
pages.description: Once you have a piece of blank wallpaper, you can add patterns to it using $(#AA22FF)banners$(). The process is totally the same as $(#33DF66)adding patterns to shields$().
